# Türme von Hanoi (Towers of Hanoi)
A Java implementation of the Towers of Hanoi puzzle using the basis library.
## Authors - Collien - Celine - Timo - Julius
## Project Structure
``` T-rmeVonHanoi/ ├── src/main/java/ # Source files │ ├── Main.java # Entry point │ ├── index.java # Main game logic │ └── MeinKnopf.java # Custom button class ├── lib/ # Libraries │ └── basis.jar # Basis GUI library ├── Türme_von_Hanoi/ # Original BlueJ files (kept for reference) └── build.gradle # Build configuration ```
## How to Run in IntelliJ IDEA
### Option 1: Using IntelliJ's Build System 1. Open the project in IntelliJ IDEA (File > Open > select this folder) 2. Wait for IntelliJ to index the project 3. Right-click on `src/main/java/Main.java` 4. Select "Run 'Main.main()'"
### Option 2: Using Gradle (if you have it installed) 1. Open Terminal in IntelliJ (Alt+F12) 2. Run: `./gradlew run` (or `gradlew.bat run` on Windows)
### Option 3: Create Run Configuration 1. Go to Run > Edit Configurations... 2. Click + > Application 3. Name: "Towers of Hanoi" 4. Main class: `Main` 5. Module: `T-rmeVonHanoi` 6. Click OK 7. Click the Run button (green triangle)
## Development
The project uses: - Java 17 or higher - basis.jar library for GUI components - Standard Java Swing for graphics
## Game Instructions
1. Click on a disc (1-4) to select it 2. Click on a tower button to move the selected disc to that tower 3. You can only place smaller discs on top of larger discs 4. Click "Ende" to exit the game
